column4: Darn, it looks like I just missed some information about Tablet PCs, no? That's exactly why I came on here, haha.
most tablets use a wacom setup.. have you tried to google your model number and "ubuntu" at the end of the search string?  you can't be the only one that's tried this.

yea.. add/remove won't do it here.. you have to get your hands dirtly a little bit.. nice thing is editing a configuration file is easy IF you have the right info to put in it.  Just make a backup of xorg before hand with (sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.backup)
